-| wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3))), wb(w0, w1))

comment: Version of ~ cbval2v with a disjoint variable condition, which does not require ~ ax-13 . (Contributed by BJ, 16-Jun-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
